title: 锁定的想象力：当人工智能成为研究本身时，人类只能是旁观者
description: 我们目前发现人工智能具有颠覆性，因为它仍在尝试模仿人类；
titleZh: 锁定的想象力：当人工智能成为研究本身时，人类只能是旁观者
titleEn: Locked Imagination: When AI Becomes Research Itself, Humans Can Only Be Spectators
descriptionZh: 我们目前发现人工智能具有颠覆性，因为它仍在尝试模仿人类；
descriptionEn: We currently find AI disruptive because it's still trying to imitate humans; but once it crosses that "adaptability threshold," it will self-replicate at a speed completely incomprehensible to humans.

title: 伊利亚的尘埃，奥特曼急需400万美元年薪寻找“末日经理”，开始工作意味着“地狱模式”

titleZh: 伊利亚的尘埃，奥特曼急需400万美元年薪寻找“末日经理”，开始工作意味着“地狱模式”

descriptionEn: Altman is offering "over $4 million + equity" to recruit someone, not to compete in model intelligence, but to buy OpenAI an "AI runaway insurance" — diving into deep water and acting as the fire chief from day one on the job.
